featured.text: Later, as steel wire became more common, inventors began to notice its elastic feature.

definition.zh_def: 鋼是一種由鐵和碳組成的合金，通常用於建築和製造。
definition.en_def: Steel is an alloy made primarily of iron and carbon, commonly used in construction and manufacturing.
definition.example: The building's framework is made of steel for added strength.
